title: Props: Passing Data to Components
story: Components become powerful when they accept data! Props let you pass information from parent to child.
instructions: Create a Greeting component that accepts a 'name' prop and displays 'Hello, [name]!' in a paragraph element.

componentTests.description: Paragraph uses the name prop (checking with default 'World')

hints.text: Access props using props.name inside JSX with curly braces: {props.name}
